story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Crafting Unforgettable Asian Travel Experiences Since 2010
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2010, AiluroWander has grown from a small local tour operator to a leading travel agency specializing in authentic Asian travel experiences. Our journey began with a simple mission: to help travelers discover the real Asia beyond the typical tourist trails.
story.paragraph2: What sets us apart is our deep connection to the local cultures and communities we serve. Our team of experienced guides and travel experts are passionate about sharing the rich heritage, traditions, and hidden gems of Asia with our guests.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to have helped thousands of travelers create lasting memories through our carefully curated tours and personalized travel experiences.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Connecting Travelers with Authentic Asian Experiences
mission.intro: At AiluroWander, we believe that travel is more than just visiting places â€“ it's about creating meaningful connections with different cultures and communities. Our mission is to:

points.authentic: Provide authentic and immersive travel experiences that go beyond typical tourist attractions

points.knowledge: Share our deep knowledge and passion for Asian cultures with our guests
points.memories: Create unforgettable memories through personalized service and attention to detail

qing_zhuge.name: Qing Zhuge
qing_zhuge.bio: Qing Zhuge brings more than 15 years of strategic leadership and deep market insight to ailurowander. As CEO, Qing drives our mission to redefine travel in Asia, combining an intimate understanding of the continent's diverse cultures with decades of industry experience. Their vision focuses on crafting personalized, meaningful experiences that go beyond the ordinary, connecting travelers authentically with destinations. Qing's expertise lies in anticipating traveler needs, fostering key partnerships, and ensuring ailurowander remains at the forefront of creating unforgettable, expertly guided explorations across Asia.

jing_li.name: Jing Li
jing_li.bio: Jing Li is the operational backbone and technological visionary of ailurowander. With over 15 years dedicated to the intricacies of Asian travel logistics, Jing leverages deep expertise to design and manage the systems that make every adventure flawless. From optimizing complex itineraries across diverse regions to implementing cutting-edge tools for real-time support, Jing ensures the seamless execution that defines the ailurowander experience. Their passion lies in solving the hidden challenges of travel, empowering our team to deliver truly effortless and enriching journeys for every client.

max_z.name: Max Z
max_z.bio: Max Z is the heart of ailurowander's client-centric approach, with over 10 years specializing in transforming travel aspirations into reality across Asia. Their deep regional knowledge and meticulous attention to detail ensure every itinerary is uniquely crafted for discovery, comfort, and cultural immersion. They lead our team of specialists, fostering unparalleled relationships and providing insightful guidance at every step. Their passion is understanding each traveler's desires and meticulously building journeys that create lasting memories and a deep connection to Asia.
